definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Le 18:20 associate, fellow, relation (perh. orig. f. abstr. association, cf. [[פֶּחָה]]);—alw. sf.: [[גֶּבֶר עֲמִיתִי]] Zec 13:7 a man (who is) my fellow; elsewhere only Lv: [[עֲמִיתוֹ]] Le 6:2, Le 6:2; recipr. [[אִישׁ בַּעֲמִיתוֹ]] Le 19:11, Le 24:19, cf . Le 25:17; [[עֲמִיתְְ]] Le 18:20, [[עֲמִיתְֶָ]] Le 19:15, Le 19:17, Le 25:14, Le 25:14, Le 25:15.
